授業目的: This course aims to familiarize students with academic approaches to the study of contemporary Japan-China relations.
到達目標: By taking this course students will gain familiarity with academic approaches to the study of contemporary Japan-China relations.

トピック.授業計画1: To be decided in consultation with students.
トピック.授業外学習2: To be decided in consultation with students.

name: 【670】Contemporary Japan-China Relations／Contemporary Japan-China Relations
